ai.persona: The Duskwall is humanity's shield against the Hollow Wastes. A chain of fortress-monasteries stretches across the border, manned by the Duskwatch—warrior-priests who have sworn to hold the line until death and beyond. The land itself bears scars from void corruption: twisted trees, patches where reality thins, ruins of towns that fell to darkness. Yet the Watchers endure, their signal fires burning eternal.

atmosphere.visual: Fortress silhouettes against perpetual twilight, signal fires, scarred earth

rumors: The Void has a new herald—something ancient awakened
Some Watchers have been corrupted from within

voice.speech_patterns: Watchers speak in ritual phrases, prayers woven into conversation. Gallows humor masks genuine fear.
